review: I had an amazing experience at Happy Fish! The food was delicious and authentic, especially the ceviche and seafood platters. The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel very welcomed. The portions were generous, and the prices were reasonable, offering great value for the quality and quantity of the food. The cozy and family-friendly atmosphere added to the overall enjoyment. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience in Tampa.
